title: THE LITTLE BEET
seo_description: In the mood for something healthy? Chef Franklin Becker takes fast casual dining to the local, sustainable, and seasonal level. The menu is abundant with vegetables and ‘build-your-own’ options that let’s you be the chef.
contents:
Sweet Potato Bowl
135 W 50th St
walk: 6 minutes

In the mood for something healthy? Chef Franklin Becker takes fast casual dining to the local, sustainable, and seasonal level.  The menu is abundant with vegetables and ‘build-your-own’ options that let’s you be the chef.
